conbody.p: Sheet metal tools in BricsCAD Mechanical V21 offer more flexibility and faster workflows. For example, a specific bend table can be assigned to each solid and arts with a different thickness can exist in the same block.

section.title: Bevels
section.p: The newly added Bevel feature is supported in the , the and the .

section.title: Zero Radius Bends
section.p: A new feature ZeroBend allows for the creation of a bend with no internal radius for sheet metal components.

section.title: T-Junction
section.p: A new feature T-Junction can be created using SMEXTRUDE on a single segment poly line lying on a flange to create a new flange orthogonal to the existing. Using the T-Junction feature we can then convert it to a T-Tab which will automatically add tabs to the orthogonal flange and remove the necessary material from the original.

section.title: Updated Smart Features
section.p: You may now create sheet metal drawings even faster by utilizing the upgraded SMSMARTFEATURE Command which allows you to automatically create junctions when utilizing the bend tool.

section.title: Tabs
section.p: The now has an option to create a curved tab on a curved hard edge, connecting a flange and a bend, including lofted bends.
The offers improved behavior for conical lofted bends. They can now be unfolded analytically, to avoid splitting them into a specified number of bends and flanges.

section.title: Assembly Export
section.p: The SMASSEMBLYEXPORTMODE system variable allows you to keep recognized features for sheet metal and poorly modeled sheet metal parts when using the .
